item.title: Junior Racers Squad
item.description: Squad description The Junior Racers Squad is the natural progression from Learn to Swim lessons. Swimmers learn training/racing skills which they practice at club meets and Swimming Tasmania Qualifying Trials Junior Racers train for 42 weeks per year. Costs Club membership (includes Swimming Tasmania registration) 6 â€“ 8 years old $105 9 years old - $160 Coaching fee (includes Pool Pass) - $90 per month Required equipment Goggles (plus a spare pair in your swim bag Club cap (plus a spare cap in your swim bag) Drink bottle Mesh swimming bag Kickboard Flippers Training sessions White Tag squad members are encouraged to attend 2 -3 training sessions a week.
